body:
After seeing the actual country/locale data in the filter list, I added a `view more` button to declutter the list a little:

![truncate](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2767162/22477409/326b3c62-e7a3-11e6-965f-09b4407a2a8c.gif)

Right now I have it capped at 5 items per filter, but all are shown if the user clicks `view more` or if they are entering a text search (at which point, all matching options are returned).

Along the same vein, text filtering the options now returns only matching options - previously, it would return the whole group of options the text was found in. (E.g. searching `uzbek` would return the whole countries list, instead of just `uzbekistan`).

@mythmon or @rehandalal - https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/405/commits/d4c06e458a15259699f5807b69a488421e9a10ad could stand to be reviewed before merging this PR
